concept.title: What's new
concept.shortdesc: HCL Sametime and HCL Sametime Premium 12.0.1 provides many new features, enhancements and fixes to servers and clients. For information on these new features and enhancement, see the HCL Sametime and HCL Sametime Premium 12.0.1 Release Information article.

conbody.p: For a listing of fixes provided in 12.0.1, refer to the HCL Sametime and HCL Sametime Premium 12.0.1 Fix List.
